Package stocker.view

Class StockerChart

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JInternalFrame
            • stocker.view.StockerChart
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants, IStockerDataListener
    public class StockerChart
extends javax.swing.JInternalFrame
implements IStockerDataListener, java.awt.event.ActionListener
    An internal frame showing data from a ChartWatchItem in a chart.
    Author:
    Marc S. Schneider
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Detail

      • notPrivilegedError

        boolean notPrivilegedError
        Flag which indicates whether an error due to missing privileges occured while pulling data. Can be used to prevent further attempts if true.

    • Constructor Detail

      • StockerChart

        public StockerChart​(StockerFrame parent,
                    ChartWatchItem w,
                    EChartType chartType,
                    java.lang.String windowName,
                    java.awt.Dimension size,
                    boolean gridlinesShown,
                    StockerControl control)
        Constructs a new StockerChart.
        Parameters:
        parent - the parent window (a StockerFrame)
        w - the ChartWatchItem that this chart refers to
        chartType - the type of chart to be created
        windowName - the title of this chart window
        size - the dimension that this chart window should initially have
        control - the StockerControl which controls this chart

    • Method Detail

      • initializeData

        public void initializeData()
        Initialize the data within this chart, i.e. pull the historic data from the data provider.

      • isInitialized

        public boolean isInitialized()
        Check whether this StockerChart has already been initialized (i.e. populated with data).
        Returns:
        true if initialized, false otherwise

      • resetData

        public void resetData()
        Reset all data in this StockerChart (e.g. because the data interval has changed and a new initialization with data pull is required).

      • setSize

        public void setSize​(java.awt.Dimension d)
        Overrides:
        setSize in class java.awt.Component

      • adaptChartPanelSize

        protected void adaptChartPanelSize()
        Adapts the size of the ChartPanel in case the window size has changed, so that the proportions of the panel are right (and the control elements stay visible).

      • updateData

        public void updateData()
        Trigger asynchronous data update (run in background), e.g. after switching intervals or plot types.

      • onPushUpdate

        public void onPushUpdate​(java.lang.String key,
                         long time,
                         double price)
        Called by StockerDataManager whenever a push update is available. Updates data for the watchlist as well as for charts and their indicators.
        Specified by:
        onPushUpdate in interface IStockerDataListener
        Parameters:
        key - the key of the item which these data refer to
        time - the unix timestamp for which a new price is reported
        price - the price at the time

      • onMouseMove

        public void onMouseMove​(java.awt.Point p)
        Mouse Listener method, required to tell the ChartPanel of this StockerChart the current mouse position, so that the crosslines can be drawn.
        Parameters:
        p - the current mouse position

      • actionPerformed

        public void actionPerformed​(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)
        Action listener method, reacting to all clicks on buttons and menu items.
        Specified by:
        actionPerformed in interface java.awt.event.ActionListener
        Parameters:
        e - the action event describing the action to be processed

      • getDtfDate

        public java.time.format.DateTimeFormatter getDtfDate()
        Get a DateTimeFormatter object which is configured for suitable formatting of dates for plotting.
        Returns:
        a DateTimeFormatter object to be used for formatting

      • getDtfTime

        public java.time.format.DateTimeFormatter getDtfTime()
        Get a DateTimeFormatter object which is configured for suitable formatting of times for plotting.
        Returns:
        a DateTimeFormatter object to be used for formatting

      • getWatchItem

        public ChartWatchItem getWatchItem()
        Get the ChartWatchItem that this chart is built on.
        Returns:

      • getChartType

        public EChartType getChartType()
        Get this chart's EChartType.
        Returns:
        this chart's EChartType

      • getGridlineState

        public boolean getGridlineState()
        Get information on whether the gridlines are currently shown in this chart.
        Returns:
        true if gridlines are shown, false otherwise

      • addChartIndicator

        public void addChartIndicator​(ChartIndicator ci)
        Adds the provided ChartIndicator to this chart.
        Parameters:
        ci - the ChartIndicator to be added

      • removeChartIndicator

        public void removeChartIndicator​(ChartIndicator ci)
        Removes the provided ChartIndicator from this chart.
        Parameters:
        ci - the ChartIndicator to be removed

      • getChartIndicators

        public java.util.ArrayList<ChartIndicator> getChartIndicators()
        Get an ArrayList with all chart indicators.
        Returns:
        an ArrayList containing all chart indicators

      • updateChartProperties

        public void updateChartProperties()
        Updates the chart with the relevant application-wide properties, which are pulled from the controller. Relevant properties are the candle scheme and the colors for alarms. Should be called whenever the application-wide properties have change (in particular, on confirming changes in the property dialog).

      • addChartAlarm

        public void addChartAlarm​(ChartAlarm ca,
                          boolean addToModel)
        Adds the provided ChartAlarm to this chart.
        Parameters:
        ca - the ChartAlarm to be added
        addToModel - determines whether this alarm should be added to the central alarm model (true) or whether it should be kept local (false)

      • removeChartAlarm

        public void removeChartAlarm​(ChartAlarm ca,
                             boolean removeFromModel)
        Removes the provided ChartAlarm from this chart.
        Parameters:
        ca - the ChartAlarm to be removed
        removeFromModel - if true, remove this alarm also from the central AlarmManager; if false, only remove locally in this chart

      • getChartAlarms

        public java.util.ArrayList<ChartAlarm> getChartAlarms()
        Get an ArrayList with all chart alarms.
        Returns:
        an ArrayList containing all chart alarms

      • getChartAlarmActivities

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Boolean> getChartAlarmActivities()
        Get an ArrayList with this chart's chart alarm activity.
        Returns:
        an ArrayList containing all chart alarm activity flags
